Uses of Class
piles.Pile

  • Packages that use Pile 
    Package Description
    game  
    piles  

    • Uses of Pile in game

      Methods in game with parameters of type Pile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Table.move(Pile sourcePile, Pile destPile)
      Takes two parameters of piles, and checking their respective addable methods, if the destination pile returns true, it allows the card to be moved.

    • Uses of Pile in piles

      Subclasses of Pile in piles 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Foundation
      The foundation is the end goal for the cards for the player to be able to win the game.
      class  StockPile
      The stock pile represents the remaining cards left after the deck has dealt to the tableau columns.
      class  TableauColumn 
      class  WastePile
      The WastePile is the pile that the stock pile will deal to within the game of patience that the player will be able to play when they cannot play any card on the tableaux.
      Methods in piles with parameters of type Pile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean WastePile.addable(Pile p) 
      boolean TableauColumn.addable(Pile p) 
      boolean StockPile.addable(Pile p) 
      boolean IGamePile.addable(Pile p) 
      boolean Foundation.addable(Pile p)
      Overridden method that specifies rule of when the card is allowed to be moved or not, specifically here, within a foundation.
      boolean WastePile.canAdd(Pile p) 
      boolean TableauColumn.canAdd(Pile p) 
      boolean StockPile.canAdd(Pile p) 
      boolean Pile.canAdd(Pile pile)
      Game logic that allows movement is addable returns true.
      boolean IGamePile.canAdd(Pile p)
